body.p: This section describes NAND Flash memory interface to MPC8306. The MPC8306 has native support for NAND Flash memory through its NAND flash control machine (FCM). eLBC interface of MPC8306 provides glueless interface to NAND Flash memory. MPC8306 supports 16-bit wide eLBC interface. NAND Flash interface of SOM card is 8-bit wide.
